titles: On the death of the most sadly, ever to be deplored, most illustrious, Right Honourable, James Lord Marquess of Montrose, &c. Funeral elegie.
author: Murray, Mungo, 17th cent.
notes: Text signed at end: M. M.

keywords: Montrose, James Graham, --  Marquis of, 1612-1650 --  Poetry.
